cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SOC, cs.CYBER. 

The paper discusses the use of various metrics and platforms to evaluate the scientific community, specifically in the fields of bibliometrics, scientometrics, informetrics, webometrics, and altmetrics. These fields are all related to digital libraries, information retrieval, social networks, and cybersecurity, which are sub-categories of computer science. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.DL (Digital Libraries), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.SOC (Social and Behavioral Sciences), and cs.CYBER (Cybersecurity).
